item.title: Constance Marten and Mark Gordon's baby, Victoria, was found dead in a shopping bag in Brighton, England, in 2023 after they spent two months on the run - on Monday, they were found guilty of gross negligence manslaughter over their baby's death. #Trial #

item.title: You can apply for a Global Health Insurance Card through the NHS website, which will provide you with free or cheaper healthcare cover in most EU countries. The UK government advises that you should also buy travel insurance as not everything is covered w
